Question: How many actors in total have portrayed Bond in film?
Details: Here are the seven actors who portrayed James Bond in film to this date (2019) : Sean Connery, David Niven, George Lazenby, Roger Moore, Timothy Dalton, Pierce Brosnan and Daniel Craig.

Question: Which one of these actors never portrayed Bond in a movie?
Clue: This is the name of a well known canadian ski destination.
Details: American actor Barry Nelson was the first to portray Bond on screen, in a 1954 television adaptation, "Casino Royale".

Question: Roger Moore appeared as Bond in how many films?
Clue: It may come after double zero.
Details: Like Connery, Moore appeared as Bond in seven films; by the time he retired in 1985, he was the oldest actor to play 007 in the Eon series.

Question: In which movie did James Bond say: "Well, I’m afraid you’ve caught me with more than my hands up."
Clue: It might be found on rings.

Question: Who wrote and interpreted the theme song of the Bond movie "Live And Let Die"?
Details: "Live And Let Die" was nominated for Academy Awards for Original Song.
